text: Dynasty was an American primetime soap opera which aired on ABC beginning in January 1981 and ending in May 1989. Starring in the series were John Forsythe, Heather Locklear, Linda Evans, Pamela Sue Martin and Joan Collins. This show was focused on the rich Carrington family from Denver, Colorado. Between 1985 and 1987 a spin-off show The Colbys was being made. == Other websites == * Category:1981 television series debuts Category:1989 American television series endings Category:1980s American drama television series Category:Denver Category:Television series about families Category:Television series set in Colorado Category:1981 establishments in the United States Category:English-language television programs Category:ABC network series
title: Dynasty (1981 TV series)
